Articles.Content: When will the current Easter Eggs be returned, some are now below ground and cant be found, would you please return them so they can be found. Also when are you going to fix the orientation for the VAB you build a ship facing the open door but it arrives on the pad sideways, its probably a simple fix any chance for the next release these could be addressed.

Are you sure of this burried easter eggs ? sounds weird.

By the way, KittopiaTech terraforming tool could help with this issue, as you can get and play with these objects I think, I haven't tried myself yet.
He's right, many of them are burried under the ground.
It's still an easter egg if they unbury it and tell us they did so?
Yep, cause they'll never say where it was Besides: needed be they can just move it around.
